text: Marty is a 1955 American romantic drama movie directed by first time director Delbert Mann and was based on the 1953 teleplay of the same name by Paddy Chayefsky. It stars Ernest Borgnine, Betsy Blair, Joe Mantell, Karen Steele, Frank Sutton, Jerry Paris and was distributed by United Artists. It was nominated for 8 Oscars and won 4 Academy Awards in 1956. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1955 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Delbert Mann Category:Best Picture Oscar Category:Movies featuring a Best Actor Academy Award-winning performance Category:Movies set in New York City Category:1950s English-language movies Category:Black-and-white movies
title: Marty
